comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:2.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0.1
Build Identifier: Thunderbird 3.1.10

When launching the action "Open message in new window", eg. when double-clicking on a message in a folder, thunderbird doesn't check for a window with this message already opened

=> you can get multiple times the same message that is opened - although this is normally not your intention as a user

=> thunderbird should activate this current window that shows already the message.

Reproducible: Always
